name: End of Tessara - GMTK
description:
Being stuck in a big 6-sided dice, You have to think smartly about how you move on to the next side of the dice without running into pits, enemies, or get stuck behind hazards. Made for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

Controls   Meet the Team: Visual Artists Designers Programmers Luka Bijmolen Peter Janssen
Dylano Solter Seb van den Beemt Viktorija Doļa
Kevin Otten Ruan Scheres Special Thanks to
  • Marea Gospic 
  • Jack Jadoenath
  • Vasco Hooiveld (Music)
  • Sound effects from: 
    https://opengameart.org/content/gui-sound-effects https://opengameart.org/content/54-casino-sound-effects-cards-dice-chips

This project was made by students of Breda University of Applied Sciences - Creative Media and Game Technologies starting the year 2021-2022.
